Luokung’s Three Business Strategies, the Cornerstone of Creation of a Digital Twin World

###### The Underlying Spatial Architecture of the Digital Twin World —

### Luokung Smart Digital Base

Four-dimensional (including temporal) multiple spatial data fusion, as well as the intelligent big data service system, fully support GIS, IoT, BIM, CIM, remote sensing, multimedia, and other data fusion applications.The extensive API interfaces and the common underlying big data service architecture and of Luokung’s three-pillar business sector support a spatial-temporal big data developer platform for multivariate ecosystems.

[View Details](/luokungbase/)

![](/template/default/images/index-base-img.png)

![](/template/default/images/index-autodrive-img.jpg)

###### Three-pillar Business Sector —

###  Smart Transportation - Autonomous Driving

The service system of smart transportation products of Luokung is based on the concept that "The Future Mobility is mutual communication and coordination between smart vehicles and smart roads ".

[View Details](/autonomousdriving/)

###### Three-pillar Business Sector —

### Carbon Neutrality and Natural Resources Management

The spatial-temporal big data service supports integrated data intelligently applying in various industries related to human living space, in terms of carbon sink calculation and statistics, forestry, agriculture, fishery, mining, water conservation, environmental protection, oceanography, and climatology, based on satellite remote sensing, Lidar, aerial photography, IoT sensors and GIS.

[View Details](/carbonneutrality/)

![](/template/default/images/index-manager-img.jpg)

![](/template/default/images/index-lbs-img.jpg)

###### Three-pillar Business Sector —

### LBS Smart Industry Services

The massive changes in LBS technologies caused a revolutionary step forward in the IoT and metaverse industry. A digital twin world pairing with the corresponding physical entity will be created based on innovative technologies such as high-definition 3D spatial localization. With the actuation of Spatial-Temporal Digital Base, Luokung actively strengthens the LBS business to provides a new generation of LBS intelligent application services in the segments of mobile Internet mobility, logistics, urban development, urban traffic, smart industrial parks, smart emergency, and urban brain services.

[View Details](/luokunglbs/)

News and Events

  * Press Release



[More](/press/)

Clients and Partners Luokung has provided solutions to many well-known enterprises
